Events that occurred on 4 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien is shipped to France.
1938 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 28.
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Pauline Baynes.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 146.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 304.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien begins writing Letter 324.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Atlanta Symphony Hall, Georgia.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings: The Official Stage Companion is published.
2010 - Warner Bros. announce that The Lord of the Rings Online will become free-to-play.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
